name: Scott F. LINDE, as Trustee of the Scott F. Linde Family's Corporation Trust, Petitioner v. Eric LINDE and Linde Enterprises, Inc., a Pennsylvania Corporation, Respondents

parties: Scott F. LINDE, as Trustee of the Scott F. Linde Family’s Corporation Trust, Petitioner v. Eric LINDE and Linde Enterprises, Inc., a Pennsylvania Corporation, Respondents

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM
AND NOW, this 22nd day of November, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

casebody.head_matter:
161 A.3d 795
Scott F. LINDE, as Trustee of the Scott F. Linde Family’s Corporation Trust, Petitioner v. Eric LINDE and Linde Enterprises, Inc., a Pennsylvania Corporation, Respondents
No. 492 MAL 2016
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
November 22, 2016
